button.useCellularData: Use Cellular Data To Back Up Items

dialog.newScreenshotDetected: New screenshot detected. Pull down for more actions.

dialog.removeFromCollectionHint: Do you want to delete this screenshot or remove it from this collection?
dialog.removeFromUncollectedHint: Do you want to delete this screenshot?
dialog.deleteCollectionHint: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? Its items will not be deleted.
dialog.freeUpSpaceHint: Your screenshots have been safely backed up. Go ahead to clean all screenshots from your phone
dialog.noNeedToBeFreeUp: No screenshot needs to be deleted.
dialog.collectionNameHint: Enter a name for this collection.

Items show the days remaining before deletion. After
that time, items will be permanently deleted.

dialog.moveToTrashHint: Items moved to trash will be kept for 60 days.
dialog.tutorialFailedHint: The app does not work without access to your photos. Please enable access under Privacy in Settings.
dialog.deleteFileHintSingle:
This item will be deleted.
This action cannot be undone.
dialog.deleteFileHintSelected:
Selected items will be deleted.

dialog.deleteFileHintAll:
All items will be deleted.

dialog.enableSearchHint: This lab feature allows you to search inside collection, only on which are created after this setting is enabled

highlightTutorial.screentShotTips1: Check all your screenshots in "Screenshots" tab.
highlightTutorial.screentShotTips2: Check all your collections in "Collections" tab.
highlightTutorial.screentShotTips3: Visit "Settings" for other functions like login, logout and clean screenshots.
highlightTutorial.collectionListTips: Easily find all uncategorized screenshots in this collection
highlightTutorial.singleImageViewTips: Scan to get access to any text, phone numbers or addresses in your screenshot
